sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with jiu lou 九漏 , nine types of leakage. Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 26: 去癩疾，諸 九瘺，心腹痛 , “To remove repudiation ailments, all nine types of fistula , and pain in the heart and abdomen”. Jiu lou 久漏 , long-term leakage [3]

Pathological Condition of lou chuang 漏瘡 , leaking sores, that fail to heal over an extended period of time. Pu ji fang 普濟方 293: 久漏方，上用九孔蜂房炙黃為末，以臘月豬脂研敷， 候收汁，以真龍骨、降真香節細末，入少許乳香，內瘡孔中 , “Recipe for long-term leakage : [For the indications listed] above, roast a wild honeycomb with nine holes until yellow and powderize. Then grind with lard from the 12th month and apply externally. Wait until [the sores] have absorbed the liquid. Then prepare a fine powder of genuine long gu and jiang zhen xiang , and add a small amount of ru xiang . This is to be put into the holes of the sores”.
